title: 【数据库系统概论】实训（一）
content:
数据库实训1

不加主键和外键的前提下创建表

https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_41542329/article/details/79001240?ops_request_misc=&request_id=&biz_id=102&utm_term=sql%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E4%B8%BB%E9%94%AE%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81&utm_medium=distribute.pc_search_result.none-task-blog-2~all~sobaiduweb~default-6-79001240.142^v51^control,201^v3^add_ask&spm=1018.2226.3001.4187

  1. 背景

    创建表的时候没有设置主键，可以通过SQL语句追加主键

  2. 语句

alter table 表名 add constraint 索引名称 primary key (成为主键的列)

第三张表

Use Master;
GO
CREATE Database education1
ON 
(   NAME=education1,
    FILENAME='C:\MSML\sqlserver\database\education.mdf',
	SIZE=2,
	MAXSIZE=unlimited,
	FILEGROWTH=1
)
LOG ON
(  NAME=education1_log,
    FILENAME='C:\MSML\sqlserver\database\education.ldf',
	SIZE=1,
	MAXSIZE=unlimited,
	FILEGROWTH=1
)
GO
Use education1;
GO

CREATE TABLE C(Cno  char(6),Cname char(20), Teacher char(10))
CREATE TABLE S(Sno  char(6),Sname char(12),Age smallint, Sex char(2))
CREATE TABLE SC(Sno char(6), Cno  char(6), Grade decimal(4,1))

GO
INSERT INTO S VALUES('S001',' liu',20, '男');
INSERT INTO S VALUES('S002',' zhang',21, '女');
INSERT INTO S VALUES('S003',' zhao',19, '男');
INSERT INTO S VALUES('S004',' wang',22, '男');
INSERT INTO S VALUES('S005',' ren',18, '女');
INSERT INTO S VALUES('S006',' xiao',19, '女');

INSERT INTO C VALUES('C001',' 数据库系统原理','赵文昕');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C002',' 计算机网络','舒伟');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C003',' 网站开发与设计','舒伟');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C004',' 移动端程序设计','黄万艮');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C005',' 数据结构','黄万艮');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C006',' Excel在管理系统中的应用','赵文昕');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C007',' 高级数据库系统','李光荣');
INSERT INTO C VALUES('C008',' VC++','鲍钦河');

INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S001',' C001', '93.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S001',' C002', '90.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S001',' C003', '83.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S001',' C004', '90.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S002',' C002', '89.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S002',' C003', '76.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S003',' C002', '83.0');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S003',' C004', '90.0');
GO

SELECT *from C;
SELECT *from S;
SELECT *from SC;

第二张表

Use Master;
GO
CREATE Database school1
ON 
(   NAME=education1,
    FILENAME='C:\MSML\sqlserver\database\school.mdf',
	SIZE=2,
	MAXSIZE=unlimited,
	FILEGROWTH=1
)
LOG ON
(  NAME=school1_log,
    FILENAME='C:\MSML\sqlserver\database\school.ldf',
	SIZE=1,
	MAXSIZE=unlimited,
	FILEGROWTH=1
)
GO
Use school1;
GO

CREATE TABLE Student( Sno char(5), Sname char(12),Ssex char(2),Sage smallint ,Sdept char(12))
CREATE TABLE Course(Cno char(5),Cname char(16),Pre_Cno  char(5),Credit smallint)
CREATE TABLE SC(Sno char(5),Cno char(5),Grade numeric(4,1))  /*Grade 取值范围0-100*/

GO
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('S01',' 王建平', '男',21,'自动化');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('S02',' 刘华', '男',19,'自动化');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('S03',' 范林军', '男',18,'计算机');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('S04',' 李伟', '男',19,'数学');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('S05',' 黄河', '男',18,'数学');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('S06',' 长江', '男',20,'数学');

INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C01',' 英语','',4);
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C02',' 数据结构','C05',2);
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C03',' 数据库','C02',2);
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C04',' DB_设计','C03',3);
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C05',' C++','C05',3);
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C06',' 网络原理','C07',3);
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('C07',' 操作系统','C05',3);

INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S01',' C01', '92');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S01',' C03', '84');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S02',' C01', '90');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S02',' C02', '94');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S02',' C03', '82');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S03',' C01', '72');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S03',' C02', '90');
INSERT INTO SC VALUES('S04',' C03', '75');
GO

SELECT *from Student;
SELECT *from Course;
SELECT *from SC;

第一张表



Use Master;
GO
CREATE Database datatest3
ON 
(   NAME=datatest3,
    FILENAME='C:\MSML\sqlserver\database\datatest3.mdf',
	SIZE=2,
	MAXSIZE=unlimited,
	FILEGROWTH=1
)
LOG ON
(  NAME=datatest3_log,
    FILENAME='C:\MSML\sqlserver\database\datatest3.ldf',
	SIZE=1,
	MAXSIZE=unlimited,
	FILEGROWTH=1
)
GO
Use datatest3;
GO

CREATE TABLE Student(studentno char(8),studentname char(12),sex char(2),birthday smalldatetime,native char(10),nation char(8),classno char(10))
CREATE TABLE Class(classno char(10),classname char(20),instiute char(12),grade char(4),classnum  tinyint )
CREATE TABLE Course(courseNo char(10),courseName varchar(20), creditHour tinyint ,courseHour    tinyint,precourse varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE Score(studentno char(8),courseNo char(10),term char(5),Score  numeric(4,1))

GO
INSERT INTO Class VALUES('AC0703',' 会计学07（3）班', '会计学院',2007,46);
INSERT INTO Class VALUES('CS0701',' 计算机07（1）班', '信息学院',2007,48);
INSERT INTO Class VALUES('IS0802',' 信息系统08（2）班', '信息学院',2008,43);

INSERT INTO Student VALUES('0701001',' 李小勇', '男','1990-12-21','南昌','汉族','CS0701');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('0701008',' 王红', '男','1992-04-26','上海','汉族','CS0701');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('0701010',' 李宏冰', '女','1992-03-09','太原','蒙古族','AC0703');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('0703045',' 王红', '男','1992-04-26','北京','汉族','AC0703');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('0802002',' 刘方晨', '女','1990-11-11','南昌','傣族','IS0802');
INSERT INTO Student VALUES('0802005',' 王红敏', '女','1990-10-01','上海','蒙古族','IS0802');

INSERT INTO Course VALUES('AC001',' 基础会计', 48,3,'NULL');
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('CN028',' 大学语文', 48,3,'NULL');
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('CS012',' 操作系统', 80,5,'NULL');
INSERT INTO Course VALUES('CS015',' 数据库系统', 64,4,'CS012');

INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701001',' CN028', 07081,85);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701001',' CS012', 07082,88);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701001',' CS015', 08091,92);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701008',' AC001', 07081,76);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701008',' CN028', 07081,86);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701008',' CS012', 07082,93);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701008',' CN015', 08091,96);

INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701010',' AC001', 07081,92);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701010',' CN028', 07081,83);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701010',' CS012', 07082,73);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701045',' AC001', 07081,52);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701045',' AC001', 08091,94);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701045',' CN028', 07081,80);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0701045',' CS015', 08091,82);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0802002',' AC001', 08091,98);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0802002',' CN028', 08091,72);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0802002',' CS015', 09101,85);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0802005',' AC001', 09101,88);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0802005',' CS012', 08092,90);
INSERT INTO Score VALUES('0802005',' CS015', 09101,87);
GO

SELECT *from Student;
SELECT *from Course;
SELECT *from Class;
SELECT *from Score;

next_post.title: 【区块链技术与应用】（五）
next_post.text: 引言这周恰逢期中，时间仓促，代码上有许多地方可以优化，但也只能留到之后的几次作业上了。阅读建议：参考和链码样例为写链码前用样例试手内容，与作业相关的内容是“资产管理”之后的代码。代码参考及学习资料在“参考”一栏中。 参考 https://blog.csdn.net/zekdot/...

author.name: Algernon
